radiographic_examinations.findings: Trace bilateral pleural effusions and accompanying atelectasis; minimally hypoattenuating liver consistent with fatty deposition; multiple hepatic lesions including a 2.7 cm segment II hemangioma and smaller hemangiomas in segments V/VIII and VII; asymmetric thickening at the base of the cecum; known perforated appendix terminating into a multilobulated right paracolic gutter abscess; mild regional reactive lymphadenopathy; trace free pelvic fluid; small hydrocele; no suspicious osseous malignancy.
